## 卒業研究（4回生）

```{r}
#| echo: false
df |> 
    arrange(ID) |> 
    mutate(File = paste0("abstract/", Year, "/", File, ".pdf")) |> 
    select(-Year, -ID) |> 
    gt() |> 
    fmt_url(columns = File, as_button = TRUE, label = "PDF") |> 
    fmt_markdown(columns = Title) |> 
    cols_label("Name"  = "氏名",
               "Title" = "題目",
               "File"  = "概要") |> 
    cols_align(columns = File, align = "center") |> 
    cols_width(Name  ~ px(150),
               File  ~ px(150))
```
